title: How to write a conclusion in third person - Quora

response.answer_text: How do you write a conclusion in the third person? = As an author, I have to decide which point of view I will write a novel. Sometimes it is events about my life so I talk in the first person. Other times it is about another person’s life so I talk in the third person. You need to be consistent and so your whole essay/novel should start and continue in the third person. This is how you write a conclusion in the third person.
